text: hageye, samud janangadedege navu avara sahodara salihâ€Œrannu kaluhisidevu. Avaru helidaru; nanna janangadavare, allahanannu matra pujisiri avana horatu nimage bere devarilla. Idiga nim'modeyana kadeyinda nim'ma balige ondu spasta puraveyu bandide. Idu allahana hennonte. Idu nim'ma paligondu sucaneyagide. Idannu idara padige bittu bidiri â€“ idu allahana bhumiyalli meyuttirali. Ketta sankalpadinda idannu muttabedi (muttidare) bhari kathina sikseyu nim'mannu avarisalide
